/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with cars and taxis, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. Buildings line the sides of the street, adding to the urban atmosphere. In the distance, trees can be seen, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures.
